title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. V, pt. 201 - Accounting, Reporting And Supervision Requirements For Public Authorities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. V, pt. 201 - Accounting, Reporting And Supervision Requirements For Public Authorities

§ 201.1 - Purpose, definitions and scope of part
§ 201.2 - Reporting and accounting requirements
§ 201.3 - Investment guidelines for public authorities
§ 201.4 - Submission of required documents and reports; waivers
§ 201.5 - Repealed

N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. V, pt. 201

Statutory authority: Constitution, art. X, § 5; State Finance

Law, § 8 [9], [14]; Public Authorities Law, art. 9, §§ 2800-2851, 2875-2925 and
related statutes; L. 1988, ch. 564

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 201.1 - Purpose, definitions and scope of part
§ 201.2 - Reporting and accounting requirements
§ 201.3 - Investment guidelines for public authorities
§ 201.4 - Submission of required documents and reports; waivers
